sub_title: Web Project Manager at Advantix Digital
summary:
Dounia is a Project Manager who helps companies such as PlainsCapital Bank, Little Greek or Ed Hardy grow their brands. After spending years working on traditional & digital advertising, branding, and web development projects, Dounia has learned how to work with both the client and the internal teams to ensure timely and successful completion of projects.

Prior to working at Advantix, Dounia worked at Microsoft where she was helping brands such as Hilton increase their online presence. Working with different agencies and on the brand side allowed her to learn how to manage different projects and connect the client's needs with the agency's strategies and solutions.

Certifications: Google Analytics, Google Ads, Bing Advertising.
Brand Experience: PlainsCapital Bank, Microsoft, Landry's Group, Valentus Group, Billy Reid, Comme des Garcons, Ed Hardy, University of Texas Arlington, Little Greek, Hilton, and many more.
Clifton Strenghtsfinder Results: Input, Learner, Arranger, Individualization, Includer.

projects.title: Thesis on how to develop Foreign Direct Investment in Morocco

contributors.headline: Web Project Manager at Advantix Digital

profile_positions.description:
- Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for flawless execution of projects
- Ensure that all projects are delivered on time, within the scope and within budget
- Ensure that quality factors are being satisfied for all projects
- Develop, implement, and maintain quality assurance protocols
- Predict resources needed to reach objectives and manage resources in an effective and efficient manner
- Develop and manage a project schedule and work plan
- Provide project updates on a consistent basis about strategy, adjustments, and progress
- Assigning tasks and communicating expected deliverables
- Utilize industry best practices, techniques, and standards throughout the entire project execution
- Monitor progress and make adjustments as needed
- Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement
- Defining responsibilities, priorities, and expectations for each team.
- Lead client & internal meetings, and communication
- Manage collaboration with vendors/partners
- Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation
profile_positions.title: Web Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Types of projects I worked on: Website development, SEO, Social Media Management, Paid Media (Google & Bing Ads, Display Ads, Social Media Ads) 

- Overseeing client programs and defining responsibilities, priorities, and expectations for each team.
- Lead client & internal meetings, and communication
- Manage day-to-day project management initiatives through CRM platform
- Partner with media teams to manage and analyze campaigns effectively, including drawing insights from data and reviewing deliverables for quality, media best practices, and relevance to the client’s business
- Identifying workflow efficiencies and enhancements for the team.
- Identifying red flags and recommending proactive solutions to mitigate risk
- Overseeing cross-functional processes and identifying opportunities to leverage various agency resources
- Manage client's Scope, budget, and timeline
- Manage collaboration with vendors/partners
- Partner with team leadership on strategic initiatives and in the development and presentation of solutions that drive business
profile_positions.title: Digital Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Account Management:
•  Worked as part of an account management team who managed books of business exceeding $200 million dollars in annual ad spend.
•  Maintained relationships with clients throughout the process of digital marketing services and projects.
• Resolved problems and issues arising from the client and/or project and identified key learnings and best practices to create ongoing improvement.
• Collaborated with internal departments and the agency to facilitate client need fulfillment.
• Analyzed the effectiveness of digital campaigns and provided opportunities.
• Trained and mentored account coordinators in Chicago and Dallas.

PPC:
- Optimized search campaigns based on client KPIs: keyword strategy, billing set up and management, implementation of new campaigns, ad groups and ad extensions, account changes and escalations, troubleshoot issues related to billing, ads, and traffic quality.
- Weekly, bi-weekly and monthly reporting based on Account, Campaign or Ad Group performance, to show campaign successes and return on investment.
- Created post-campaign analysis reports using Bing UI, UCM and Excel to ensure winning strategies are adopted and shared as best practices: pacing, health check, auction insights, bid suggestion, conflicting negative, search query, ads/keywords disapprovals, syndication, partition, keyword expansion, snapshots.
profile_positions.title: SEM Account Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Launched and managed Google Adwords and Social Media Advertising Campaigns with a proactive, detailed, strategic and analytical approach for global restaurants chains, nonprofit organizations, and food companies.
•	Managed a ~400k monthly digital media budget in paid search, paid social, display and video ad platforms. 
•	Optimized campaigns to maximize ROI through continuous A/B testing, keyword research, ad copy and extension creation, bid and budget management, and audience testing strategy; increasing CTR by ~45% and Conversions by ~20% in Q3 (metrics for one account).
•	Collaborated with the creative team on ads deliverables for social media campaigns.
•	Collected and interpreted monthly digital media performance data to provide key insights and opportunities report; additionally, conducted monthly conference calls with the client regarding campaign performance and recommended modifications for improved campaign performance.
•	Researched and developed digital media plans for clients; across paid search, paid social, display and video to accomplish client business objectives; created content calendar and identified target audience; recommended budgets and ideal media channels
•	Collaborated and communicated with Google on innovative ideas and best practices.
•	Remain up-to-date on competition and client industry through trade publications, newspapers, websites, and assessing the potential impact of industry events/trends on the client's business.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Collaborated with the e-commerce team and web designers to create landing pages and optimize user experience ( Authentic Moroccan Project)
• Prepared online newsletters and retargeting emails, and organized their distribution through Shopify and MailChimp. ( Authentic Moroccan Project)
• Acquired insights on online marketing trends to keep strategies up-to-date
• Collaborated with the SEO team on optimizing websites for our clients to improve ranking, traffic and conversion rate through on-site and off-site optimization.
• Performed QA and highly-detailed websites audits for our existing and prospective clients using Moz, Screaming Frog, Spyfu and SEMrush
• Improved performance and quality score of assigned paid search accounts through keyword research and optimization, ad copy creation, landing page testing. 
• Analyzed weekly and monthly performance report using Google Analytics (weekly digital pacing report and monthly impressions reports) to measure ROI and track performance for all Advantix Digital clients.  
• Generated online reputation management reports using 1/3 party technology.
• Optimized and monitor trends in clients market and appropriately adjust strategy or timelines. 

About the company: 
Advantix Digital is one of the nation’s first digital marketing agencies. We are a 4x Google All-Star, putting us in the top .5% of agencies in the US. All of our analysts are Google, Facebook, Bing and HIPAA certified. Featured as one of Inc.’s 5000 fastest growing companies, we offer digital branding, creative, SEO, paid and programmatic services.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist

company.name: The International School of Los angeles

profile_positions.location: Région de Greater Los Angeles, États-Unis
profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities  : 
• Built brand awareness and demand by managing advertising and collaterals for our five campuses: created content calendar and collaborated with designers and printing companies on deliverables.
• Collaborated with the advancement team and developed innovative marketing strategies
• Managed all aspects of promotional events planning for the admissions department: including location research and arrangement, invitations and promotion, sponsorship solicitation, and catering coordination.
• Managed the outreach through marketing research focused on the french community and a WOM plan through parent ambassadors, education consultants, relocation agents, moms groups...
• Managed the database of prospective parents and CRM systems for marketing use.

About the company: 
The International School of Los Angeles is a nonprofit, private, dual immersion international French school for grades Preschool-12th in Greater Los Angeles. The School holds triple accreditation: by the French Ministry of Education, as well as the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), and the International Baccalaureate Organisation (IBO) in Geneva, Switzerland.
The International School of Los Angeles was ranked 12th in the Washington Post’s 2015 list of America’s most challenging private high schools.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
Using MailChimp and Salesforce: 
• Identifying specific company, client, industry, competitor, and industry trends research using industrial architecture services.
•  Generating sales leads and contacts through canvassing; penetrating existing markets; commercial follow-up.
•  Responsible for creation, tailoring, and production of presentations and proposals
• Helping with the brand awareness process through trade shows planning & attendance, and public relations
• Maintain and update clients and prospects lists in the firm’s customer
relationship management (CRM) system to track new & developing business and post-event follow-up.
• Risks management: credit insurance (Coface).

About the company:
Established in 1984 by Francesco Giganti, Architect, and Design specialist. The agency designs buildings and industrial equipment for some of the largest international construction companies such as Aeroport de Paris, RATP...
profile_positions.title: International Business Development Associate

profile_positions.location: Région de Greater Los Angeles, États-Unis
profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities: 
• Performing viability research and pilot marketing activities in the USA for this high-end clothing brand.
• Responsibilities included viability research, market analysis, marketing plan, digital media, managing, PR agency contact, piloting with national accounts, trade exposition, event planning, Report to CEO.

About the Company: 
Ed Hardy is a line of clothing based on tattoo art. In two years the Ed Hardy line exploded into the fashion world and became one of the most desired and recognizable brands of its time.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
Using Hootsuite Social Media Platform et MailChimp: 

•       Implementation of campaigns on social media.
•       Newsletter creation
•	Develop content strategy aligned with short-term and long-term marketing targets
•	Collaborate with marketing and design teams to plan and develop site content, style, and layout
•	Create and publish engaging content
•	Optimize content according to SEO
•	Analyze website traffic and users engagement metrics
•	Manage content distribution to online channels and social media platforms to increase web traffic
•	Develop an editorial calendar and ensure content team is on board
•	Ensure compliance with law (e.g. copyright and data protection)
•       Stay up-to-date with developments and generate new ideas to draw audience’s attention
•       Performing social media optimization 

About the company:
The StyleWise is an online magazine serving up a staple diet of music, fashion, beauty and style trends.  The magazine is often featured as a notable podcast on iTunes and will soon have its own channel on Smart TV's and DVD's in over 30 countries on 15 million devices.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Responsible for ocean freight coordination from origin to foreign destination.
• Job duties included dealing with customers and cargo companies, creation of travel and billing documents, negotiation, sales.

About the Company:
APX is an international-shipping global ocean-freight-forwarder NVOCC serving a broad range of industrial clients, household goods, and personal effects shippers, military cargo, government shipments, individuals and moving companies who rely on expertise and performance. APX is the founder of one of the most reliable and responsive international shipping networks on earth. APX has developed worldwide cargo alliance of international freight forwarders and agents whom partner to provide all-inclusive transportation and logistics services. APX has also developed unique proprietary tools such as the first automatic shipping-calculator for international-shipping cost and the first iPhone App for automatic shipping quotes and online bookings.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Coordinating sales relations between the headquarter and the overseas boutiques for this high-end Japanese brand.
• Responsibilities included providing customer service, preparing merchandise, billing and transport documents, organizing shipment, inventory.

About the Company:
Established in 1969, Comme des Garçons, French for "Like Boys"  is a Japanese fashion label headed by Rei Kawakubo.
Comme des Garçons is based in Tokyo and also in the prestigious Place Vendôme in Paris. Each year, the company grosses about $180 million.
